bill_title: Expressing the deep respect of the Legislature on the occasion of the passing of Governor Joe Foss.

bill_versions.bill_text: A CONCURRENT RESOLUTION, Expressing the deep respect of the Legislature on the occasion of the passing of Governor Joe Foss. WHEREAS, Joe Foss exemplified the best Midwestern values instilled in so many of a generation raised in rural South Dakota during the Great Depression; and WHEREAS, Joe Foss rendered service to his county unsurpassed by any of his band of brothers who blunted the Japanese offense in the perilous days of the South Pacific Theater; and WHEREAS, Joe Foss returned from the war to continue to fight for a better South Dakota as a representative in the state Legislature and as a dynamic young Governor; and WHEREAS, Joe Foss never ceased representing the best of South Dakota as a national sports executive, a noted network television personality, and a widely honored hunter, fisherman, and outdoorsman: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the House of Representatives of the Seventy- eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, the Senate concurring therein, that a lifetime of achievement, dedication, and zest for living be recognized in the person of South Dakota's favorite son and hero, Joe Foss. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
